SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.retailproductcatalog.dao

Interface ProductDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductDAOImpl
public interface ProductDAO
The ProductDAO interface provides CRUD operations for managing Product data in the data store.

It defines methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting products.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      Product addProduct(Product product) throws ProductDataAccessException
      Adds a new product to the data store.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be added
      Returns:
      the added product
      Throws:
      ProductDataAccessException - if a data access error occurs

    • getProductById

      Product getProductById(int productId) throws ProductDataAccessException
      Retrieves a product by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to retrieve
      Returns:
      the product with the specified ID
      Throws:
      ProductDataAccessException - if the product is not found or a data access error occurs

    • getAllProducts

      List<Product> getAllProducts() throws ProductDataAccessException
      Retrieves all products from the data store.
      Returns:
      a list of all products
      Throws:
      ProductDataAccessException - if a data access error occurs

    • updateProduct

      Product updateProduct(Product product) throws ProductDataAccessException
      Updates an existing product in the data store.
      Parameters:
      product - the product with updated data
      Returns:
      the updated product
      Throws:
      ProductDataAccessException - if the update fails or a data access error occurs

    • deleteProductById

      int deleteProductById(int productId) throws ProductDataAccessException
      Deletes a product by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      the id of the deleted product
      Throws:
      ProductDataAccessException - if the deletion fails or a data access error occurs
